languages.text: "Сержант Лассэ Малгар, Ваш высокобродие! Верный солдат династии Винтерскейл в одиннадцатом поколении, имею три похвалы за безупречность в служении. Испокон веков повелось, что на Райкаде Минорис Его Милость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} солдат и корабельщиков себе набирает, так что нет для райкадца превыше чести, чем прилежно служить Его Светлости!"

traits.locale_text: "Сержант Лассэ Малгар, Ваш высокобродие! Верный солдат династии Винтерскейл в одиннадцатом поколении, имею три похвалы за безупречность в служении. Испокон веков повелось, что на Райкад Минорис Его Милость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} солдат и корабельщиков себе набирает, так что нет для райкадца превыше чести, чем прилежно служить Его Милости!"

languages.text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"
languages.original_text: "Сержант Лассэ Малгар, Ваш высокобродие! Верный солдат династии Винтерскейл в одиннадцатом поколении, имею три похвалы за безупречность в служении. Испокон веков повелось, что на Райкаде Минорис Его Милость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} солдат и корабельщиков себе набирает, так что нет для райкадца превыше чести, чем прилежно служить Его Светлости!"

Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

languages.text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Treuer Soldat des Hauses Winterzunder in elfter Generation, drei Belobigungen für makellose Dienste. Seine Lordschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} rekrutiert seit Urzeiten auf Rykad Minoris Soldaten und Schiffsbauer, es gibt für einen Rykadier also keine größere Ehre, als seiner Lordschaft treu zu dienen!"
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Treuer Soldat des Hauses Winterzunder in elfter Generation, drei Belobigungen für makellose Dienste. Seine Lordschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} rekrutiert seit Urzeiten auf Rykad Minoris Soldaten und Schiffsbauer, es gibt für einen Rykadier also keine größere Ehre, als seiner Lordschaft treu zu dienen!"

languages.text: « Sergent Lasse Malgar, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Soldat de onzième génération, fidèle à la maison Winterscale et cité trois fois pour ses états de service. Ça fait longtemps que Sa Seigneurie le {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} recrute des soldats et des ingénieurs navals sur Rykad Minoris, et c'est un véritable honneur pour un Rykadien de le servir au mieux de ses capacités. »
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: « Sergent Lasse Malgar, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Soldat de onzième génération, fidèle à la maison Winterscale et cité trois fois pour ses états de service. Ça fait longtemps que Sa Seigneurie le {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} recrute des soldats et des ingénieurs navals sur Rykad Minoris, et c'est un véritable honneur pour un Rykadien de le servir au mieux de ses capacités. »

languages.text: “我是雷斯·马尔加军士，长官！我是温特斯凯尔家族第十一代忠诚士兵，因为服役出色，获得过三次嘉奖。很久以前，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}大人就一直在小莱卡德上招募士兵和造船工人。对于莱卡德人而言，能为领主抛洒血汗，就是最大的荣誉！”
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: “我是雷斯·马尔加军士，长官！我是温特斯凯尔家族第十一代忠诚士兵，因为服役出色，获得过三次嘉奖。很久以前，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}大人就一直在小莱卡德上招募士兵和造船工人。对于莱卡德人而言，能为领主抛洒血汗，就是最大的荣誉！”

languages.text: 「ラッセ・マルガー軍曹です！ウィンタースケール家に忠誠を誓う11代目の兵士で、優秀な兵士として3度の表彰を受けました。昔から{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}様はライカド・ミノリスで兵士や船大工を雇っています。ライカド人にとって、陛下に勤勉さをもって仕えることほど名誉なことはありません！」
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: 「ラッセ・マルガー軍曹です！ウィンタースケール家の11代目の忠実な兵士で、優秀な兵士として3度の表彰を受けました。昔から{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}様はライカド・ミノリスで兵士や船大工を雇っています。ライカド人にとって、陛下へ熱心に仕えることほど名誉なことはありません！」

languages.text: «¡Sargento Lasse Malgar! Soldado de undécima generación leal a la Casa Winterscale, condecorado con tres menciones por su intachable servicio. Desde los tiempos antiguos, milord el {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} ha reclutado soldados y navegantes en Rykad Minoris, ¡así que no hay mayor honor para un rykadiano que servir a milord con dedicación!».
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: ¡Sargento Lasse Malgar! Soldado de undécima generación leal a la Casa Winterscale, condecorado con tres menciones por su intachable servicio. Desde los tiempos antiguos, milord el {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} ha reclutado soldados y navegantes en Rykad Minoris, ¡así que no hay mayor honor para un rykadiano que servir a milord con dedicación!».

languages.text: "Çavuş Lasse Malgar efendim! Winterscale Hanesi'nin on birinci nesil sadık askeri, üç kusursuz hizmet madalyası sahibiyim. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} Lord Hazretleri eskilerden beri askerlerini ve tersanecilerini Rykad Minoris'ten alır. Bu yüzden bir Rykadlı için Lord Hazretleri'ne ihtimamla hizmet etmekten daha büyük şeref yoktur!"
languages.original_text: "Sergeant Lasse Malgar, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Eleventh-generation loyal soldier of House Winterscale, awarded three commendations for faultless service. Ever since the olden days, His Lordship the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} has recruited soldiers and shipwrights on Rykad Minoris, so there is no greater honour for a Rykadian than serving His Lordship with diligence!"

traits.locale_text: "Çavuş Lasse Malgar efendim! Winterscale Hanesi'nin on birinci nesil sadık askeri, üç kusursuz hizmet madalyası sahibiyim. Lord Hazretleri {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} eskilerden beri askerlerini ve tersanecilerini Rykad Minoris'ten alır. Bu yüzden bir Rykadlı için Lord Hazretlerine ihtimamla hizmet etmekten daha büyük şeref yoktur!"
